    • entranceToDiningRoom

      public int entranceToDiningRoom(Student student)
      Move a student from the entrance to the diningRoom. Returns the coin if the student is added in a coin earning place
      Parameters:
      student - student to move
      Returns:
      the number of coins earned (max 1 with the current rules)

    • entranceToIsland

      Returns:
      the total number of students of a specific color that are sitting in the dining room
